column2: Name: “Table 1 of 1 on page 93 of 124”
Table: 85
DESCRIPTION
Design and construct a therapeutic addition to Old Hampton
Community Center to accommodate persons with disabilities in multiple
settings for afterschool care and holidays.
Design and construct a zero entry pool to accommodate physically
challenged individuals participating in community integration leisure
services.
Implement activities recommended in the North King Street Master
Plan.
Phoebus Master Plan activities include eliminating blighted properties,
preserving and restoring historic properties, extending streetscape
improvements, public infrastructure improvements, landscaping,
parking improvements to public buildings and new construction.
TOTAL: Master Plans
Funds to acquire property in strategic areas of the City that are critical
to Hampton's continued economic vitality.
TOTAL: Other CIP Projects
Relocate/re-construct a new fire station. The current station is in need
of electrical, plumbing and mechanical upgrades; asbestos abatement
and expansion to accommodate current standard sized fire apparatus.
The relocation will place the station in a more centralized location and
facilitate expansion of the neighboring Wythe Elementary School.
TOTAL: Public Safety
TOTAL: PRIORITY CONTINGENCY LIST
